divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking around the track at the local middle school. I looked over because there was someone firing a hand gun in the woods. I noticed the jet streams in the air. One jet had already passed. I looked at the jet that was passing. Directly underneath the jet (about an inch below looking at it) was a dark circle, aligned with the jet, flying the same speed as the jet & not leaving a jet stream. I stopped walking. I could not believe what I was seeing. I've seen things before but only for split moments. This was continuos and very clear. I stood and watched it for about 20-30 seconds. I then began to jog across the field to call my buddy. as I was jogging across the field the dark circle flew far out in front and above the plane, leaving no jet stream. It then suddenly became a silver cigar shaped object only for a second. It returned to the dark sphere shape and flew back behind and lower than the plane. once again it turned this silver cigar shape for a second and then back to the circle shape. I reached into my car, pulled out my cellphone & called my friend. When I looked up again it was gone. I continued to watch the jet until it was no longer in sight. 2 more jets passed within the next 20 minutes, but with no objects following them.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Kannapolis
There were no other sightings in Kannapolis on or around June 23rd 2007
Summary: UFO flying near a jet in Kannapolis
